JobFullDesc: The Bounteous Business Intelligence team is currently looking for a Business Intelligence Analyst who can lead reporting, dash-boarding, and analysis for strategic clients. The right candidate should have a strong understanding of digital analytics, data visualization, marketing tactics and strategies, enabling strong recommendations and insights in program reporting.Role and Responsibilities Develop regular and ad hoc analyses rooted in drawing out insights and optimizationWork with internal teams and clients to strategize and implement analytics measurement plansAcquire data from primary or secondary data sources; work with data science and data implementation teams as necessary to ensure proper data tracking and aggregationProvide quality assurance of data on an ongoing basis, identifying and correcting inaccuraciesWork directly with clients in presenting analysis and reporting on ongoing marketing initiativesManage and grow analytics partnerships, staying on top of cutting edge technologies and vendorsRecognize opportunities for efficiencies in processes, and work appropriately across teams to realize enhancementsPreferred Qualifications4+ years digital analytics experienceHas focused on one or more of the following areas: digital analytics, optimization, statistical modeling, consumer insights, and/or marketing analyticsA degree in IT, Digital Marketing Analytics, or related field plus internship experience in digital analyticsExperienced with Google Analytics and has implemented, configured, and customized the toolExperience with Microsoft Power BI is required, with experience in at least one other data visualization platform also preferred (Tableau, Data Studio, DOMO, etc.)Keen eye for developing insightful data visualizationStrong proficiency in excelUnderstand how to read and interpret reportsAbility to clearly explain technical ideas verbally and in writingAbility to manage and prioritize a number of concurrent projectsA team player that can lead analytics projects and rally colleagues around a shared visionDesire and talent for presenting data to clients and colleaguesR knowledge or can speak to big dataExperience with BigQuery and SQL is a plus#BI-Remote#LI-RemoteIf you have passion and intelligence, and possess a technical knack (even if you’re missing some of the above), we encourage you to apply.Bounteous is focused on promoting an inclusive environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate the different viewpoints and experiences our diverse group of team members bring to Bounteous. Bounteous does not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, sex, gender identity, sexual orientation, age, physical or mental disability, national origin, veteran status, or any other status protected under federal, state, or local law. Bounteous is willing to sponsor eligible candidates for employment visas.
